author: Andy Pearson
method: Place all of the ingredients except the cherry and lemon slice into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a rocks glass and garnish with a fresh cherry on the stem and a lemon slice.
ingredients: 50ml/1¾fl oz pisco (grape brandy),  50ml/1¾fl oz lime juice,  25ml/1fl oz sugar syrup,  1 dash bitters,  ½ free-range egg white,  1 cherry, stem attached,  1 lemon slice
